question: Which among the following is not the work of Hegel?
option3: Elements of the Philosophy of Right
explanation: Hegel wrote the, Science of Logic (1811-1816), which is the logical and metaphysical core of his philosophy. Hegel wrote the, Encyclopedia of the Philosophical Sciences, (1816) which is a summary of his entire philosophical system. Hegel wrote the, Elements of the Philosophy of Right,( 1817) which is related to his political philosophy.
